channel.title: BFTP: Shadow Warrior Demo
channel.description:
Blast from the Past presents: ![](upload://wdFKLFVd9FXQOx9mMy3vzS9Ie2n.png) [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?go0omdzelgm']Shadow Warrior Demo (Dosbox)[/url] (sound sutters every now and then) 1. Extract Folder 2. Run Dosbox.exe 3. Type Setup to set controls 4. Type SW to run game
OR
[url='https://www.mediafire.com/?qtxnohy1hob']Shadow Warrior Demo (SWP)[/url] (with midi music) 1. Extract Folder 2. Run SWP.EXE 3. Click Start

item.title: BFTP: Shadow Warrior Demo
item.dc:creator: BaTz281
item.description:
Maybe compile all these into one full-titled (i.e “Blast From The Past!” instead of “BFTP”) thread. That way there’d be a central repository of these links (which are great, by the way, I haven’t tried ROTT or SW yet but I plan to )

item.title: BFTP: Shadow Warrior Demo
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
Blast from the Past presents:

Shadow Warrior Demo (Dosbox)
(sound sutters every now and then)

  1. Extract Folder
  2. Run Dosbox.exe
  3. Type Setup to set controls
  4. Type SW to run game

OR

Shadow Warrior Demo (SWP)
(with midi music)

  1. Extract Folder
  2. Run SWP.EXE
  3. Click Start

Read full topic
